**Wikipedia summary**:  
<i><b>Rosa gymnocarpa</b></i> is a species of rose native to western North America. It is known by the common names <b>dwarf rose</b>, <b>baldhip rose</b>, and <b>wood rose</b>. It grows in shady, damp, and rich forests.
